How do I claim my rewards: Click on claim rewards, select the points to convert .10 reward points is one dollar. As of now, we have only Amazon gift card as an option claim.
How to Message Reciters:
On the Top Right Part of your screen There is a Message icon. Click on it and Press (View All). 
 When you get redirected to the messageing page search for your recuirters  name.
How do I get Verified:
You will have to wait until the admins of the website look and approve the account.
